BBK01.SU0065: Deposit rates of banks / Savings deposits - Special savings facilities, lump-sum savings contracts concluded for 1 year / Lowest rate of spread

General: Since January 1991 the rates of banks in the new Länder have been included in the interest rate survey. The spread is ascertained by eliminating the reports in the top 5% and the bottom 5% of the interest rate range. From December 1996 no longer collected.
